blog.name: ao3feed-wolfstar
blog.title: remus x sirius ao3 feed
blog.description: (I don't actually read all these fics or choose what comes on the blog, it's literally just a feed of the ao3 ship tag sorry)

title: After us, the flood
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2YqVQ6K

by aryastark_valarmorghulis, bloodsuitsandtears

“I was hoping you might be waiting for me.” His tone is light and friendly, but Remus isn’t fooled.
“I stopped for a smoke.” He wonders, though. Was he unwittingly waiting for Sirius? In the last eight years, there had been countless smoke breaks, quick trips to grab another wine bottle, rendezvous to decide James’ birthday gift, that dissolved into a sloppy snog or a quickie. It didn’t happen every time Sirius was back in the country, but it was close enough.

Words: 10074, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Sirius Black
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Post-First War with Voldemort, Post-Break Up, Getting Back Together, James Potter & Lily Evans Potter Live, Peter Pettigrew went to Azkaban, Smut, POV Remus Lupin


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2YqVQ6K

body:
Hermione Granger panic mode

As if I needed more evidence that I was Hermione, I just had a dream that my last class of the semester FINALLY posted our last 2 grades and I ended up with an A- instead of the A I’ve had all semester which woke me up in a panic 🤦🏻‍♀️

blog.name: giratiempo-hp
blog.title: Giratiempo
blog.description:
Año 2023. Un giratiempo trae personas del pasado hasta el presente. 
El Ministerio de Magia está desmemorizando a magos y muggles del pasado y recluyéndolos, a la espera de poder devolverles a sus épocas de origen.
La OSPP intenta localizar a los llegados de otras épocas antes de que lo haga el Ministerio, para darles una segunda oportunidad.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

blog.name: everyfandomislovedbyme
blog.title: Untitled
blog.description: Random incorrect quotes that I believe fictional characters have said, but the authors of there story didn't put it in the books. I do The Mortal Instruments, Percy Jackson, Harry Potter, and more!

summary:
Harry arrives to the burrow late and Ms. Weasley is sitting there waiting: Where have you been?
Harry: Out with...
body:
Harry arrives to the burrow late and Ms. Weasley is sitting there waiting: Where have you been?
Harry: Out with Dumbledore
Dumbledore turns on the light: Try Again
Harry: You caught me, I was at Hagrids
Hagrid comes out: Try again, Laddie.
Harry: Me, Ron, and Hermione were out doing something-investingating err-
Ron and Hermione come from Upstairs: Try again mate.
Harry: Okay-I was with Draco!
Mcgonnald comes through floo powder: You're not still worked up with the nonsense he's a deatheater are you Mr.Potter?
Harry: ... Yes, I'm sorry professor. I was following him to make sure.
Everyone rolls there eyes at Harry Potters usual antics but later when he's put to bed he closes his eyes and thinks about his and Draco's date.
Harry's shrugs as he turns to get comfortable: I DID follow Draco...

blog.name: bellobellissimoinfinity
blog.title: Bello Bellissimo Infinity
blog.description: “I am the artist who loves shapes and all kinds of beauty. Beauty is not a relative thing. Beauty is God. God is beauty with feeling. Beauty is in feeling. I love beauty because I feel it and therefore understand it. Thinking people write nonsense about beauty. Beauty cannot be discussed. Beauty cannot be criticized. I am no criticism. Criticism is an attempt to be clever. I flaunt my beauty. I feel love for beauty.”

blog.name: potterish

blog.description: O único fã-site brasileiro premiado por J. K. Rowling | Conteúdo completo em Potterish.com ☇

summary: Pottermore e Warner Bros. anunciam nova parceria
title: Pottermore e Warner Bros. anunciam nova parceria
description:
O Pottermore, plataforma digital e editora de Harry Potter, anunciou uma nova parceria com com a Warner Bros, estúdio responsável pelos filmes das séries Harry Potter e Animais Fantásticos. O Wizarding World Digital, como será chamada a nova plataforma, combinará o material das duas empresas e será lançado no dia 15 de maio de 2019.

Wizarding World Digital será responsável pela administração do Pottermore.com e do WizardingWorld.com, incluindo o banco de dados de usuários registrados nos dois sites. Neil Blair, presidente do Pottermore e agente de J.K. Rowling, declarou que essa parceria era um objetivo a longo prazo. “Essa parceria ampliará e aprofundará o que estávamos fazendo no Pottermore até agora”, disse ele.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Pottermore.com, uma plataforma digital interativa com conteúdo original de J.K. Rowling foi lançada pela primeira vez em 2012 e incluí jogos, loja online e a editora do Pottermore. Em 2015 o site já passou por uma transformação, que removou muito dos elementos interativos.

The post Pottermore e Warner Bros. anunciam nova parceria appeared first on Potterish.com.

reblog.comment:
O Pottermore, plataforma digital e editora de Harry Potter, anunciou uma nova parceria com com a Warner Bros, estúdio responsável pelos filmes das séries Harry Potter e Animais Fantásticos. O Wizarding World Digital, como será chamada a nova plataforma, combinará o material das duas empresas e será lançado no dia 15 de maio de 2019.

Wizarding World Digital será responsável pela administração do Pottermore.com e do WizardingWorld.com, incluindo o banco de dados de usuários registrados nos dois sites. Neil Blair, presidente do Pottermore e agente de J.K. Rowling, declarou que essa parceria era um objetivo a longo prazo. “Essa parceria ampliará e aprofundará o que estávamos fazendo no Pottermore até agora”, disse ele.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Pottermore.com, uma plataforma digital interativa com conteúdo original de J.K. Rowling foi lançada pela primeira vez em 2012 e incluí jogos, loja online e a editora do Pottermore. Em 2015 o site já passou por uma transformação, que removou muito dos elementos interativos.
